title: 문장 리듬 ②
description: 구조 변환: 동일 내용 문장을 단문/복문 두 가지 버전으로 말해보기. 예) The experiment failed. It was disappointing. vs The experiment failed, which was disappointing. 리듬 비교.
examples: The experiment failed. It was disappointing.
The experiment failed, which was disappointing.
We completed the project. Everyone was satisfied.
learning_points: 문장 구조 변환을 통한 리듬감 조절과 표현력 다양화

sentences.en: The experiment failed. It was disappointing.
The experiment failed, which was disappointing.
We completed the project. Everyone was satisfied.
We completed the project, which satisfied everyone.
We introduced a new strategy. The results were amazing.

sentences.kr: 놀라운 결과를 가져온 새로운 전략을 도입했습니다.
sentences.en: We introduced a new strategy, which brought amazing results.

sentences.kr: 회의가 연장되었습니다. 결정을 다음 주로 미뤄습니다.
sentences.en: The meeting was extended. We postponed the decision to next week.

sentences.kr: 회의가 연장되어 결정을 다음 주로 미뤄습니다.
sentences.en: The meeting was extended, causing us to postpone the decision to next week.
